results.title: Metformin Reduces the Incidence of Sensorineural Hearing Loss in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus: A Retrospective Chart Review
results.text_hl: Few reports have indicated the usefulness of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ for @<m>DISEASE_Hearing_Loss_Sensorineural</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006319 @@@SNHL@@@.

results.title: Metformin lowers risk of hearing loss and mortality in type 2 diabetes.
results.text_hl: The rigorous definitions of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ exposure and an actively treated comparator group emphasize these findings, suggesting @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@'s potential role in @<m>DISEASE_Hearing_Loss_Sensorineural</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006319 @@@SSNHL@@@ prevention and improved survival.

results.title: Mitochondrial encephalopathy, lactic acidosis, and stroke-like episodes diagnosed after metformin-triggered stroke-like episodes.
results.text_hl: Thus, we encourage physicians to exercise caution in the prescription of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Growth_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D006130 @@@short stature@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Hearing_Loss_Sensorineural</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006319 @@@sensorineural hearing loss@@@, or young-onset @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes mellitus@@@ because these @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ may have undiagnosed @DISEASE_Mitochondrial_encephalopathy @DISEASE_MESH:C538525 @@@mitochondrial encephalopathy@@@, @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@, and @DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@-like episodes.

citations.NLM: Murakami K, Sakamoto K, Ishiguchi H, Ito H. Mitochondrial encephalopathy, lactic acidosis, and stroke-like episodes diagnosed after metformin-triggered stroke-like episodes. J Stroke Cerebrovasc Dis. 2023 May;32(5):107080. PMID: 36933522

results.title: Insulin for the treatment of women with gestational diabetes.
results.text_hl: There was no clear evidence of difference in postnatal weight retention between @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ treated with @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ and those treated with oral anti-@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ pharmacological therapy (@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@) at six to eight weeks postpartum (MD -1.60 kg, 95% CI -6.34 to 3.14; one study, 167 @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@; low-quality evidence) or one year postpartum (MD -3.70, 95% CI -8.50 to 1.10; one study, 176 @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@; low-quality evidence).

citations.NLM: Brown J, Grzeskowiak L, Williamson K, Downie MR, Crowther CA. Insulin for the treatment of women with gestational diabetes. Cochrane Database Syst Rev. 2017 Nov 5;11(11):CD012037. PMID: 29103210
